entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of wet snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 9. POP 30%
